content.prompt: The narrator in the passage speaks from the point of view of

choices.label: an outsider who is nevertheless knowledgeable about the community’s history and practices
an all-knowing observer who understands all the characters’ deepest thoughts and feelings
a storyteller who invents an unbelievable story to entertain the community
a member of a community with insight into its people and their experiences

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
